|utc_offset = +1 |timezone_DST = [[Central European Summer Time|CEST]] |utc_offset_DST = +2 }} '''Heumen''' ({{pronunciation|Nl-Heumen.ogg}}) is a [[municipality]] and a village in the eastern [[Netherlands]]. == Population centres == *Heumen *[[Malden, Netherlands|Malden]] (administrative centre) *[[Molenhoek, Gelderland, Netherland|Molenhoek]] (partly) *[[Nederasselt]] *[[Overasselt]] == Brabant|Grave]] ([[North Brabant|NB]]) | Northwest = [[Wijchen]] }} {{Gelderland Province}} [[Category:Municipalities of Gelderland]] [[Category:Populated places in Gelderland]]
